review: Great versatile product. Can't beat the price.
author: Brian Solis

review: Would not work with my Vizio TV.
author: Bruce C Voiles

review: Google really dropped the ball with this thing. It's only applicable in certain situations, and while it's easy to get it on the internet, finding apps/programs it will work with is a waste of time. I wanted to be able to screenshare easily from my wireless devices, but this is not the solution I was looking for.
author: vitalicvision

review: Chromecast RULES ! EASY to install, it's pretty much PLUG AND PLAY... :D
author: Ozkr.

review: Love love love this. Purchased as a gift for hubby and he uses it daily now.
author: Char Lunsford "Charla"

review: Love this!  Great price no issues and easy to set up!
author: Rosemarie

review: getting troubles to connect, after tried several times working fine, but still issues every time I want to use,
author: Jesiiec

review: I'm unable to stream to my TV in my area due to low internet speed so I purchased two of these for two different TVs in my house & am now able to stream through my iPad with no problem.  This is very easy to hook up by following the instructions.  I am now one happy streamer!!
author: Wafi

review: Very easy to connect. Came in 3 days. Awesome.
author: Pamela Fantroy

review: Easy to install, but product  didn't work as advertised. Streaming was extremely slow if it worked at all.
author: Samuel W Bishop III
